Account.AgeNote: Must be held in trust for under 7's.
Account.TaxMethod: Interest is paid without tax being deducted, but may be taxable depending on your personal circumstances
Account.IntPaidAwayCompoundedType: Interest must be compounded

DepositorProtection.CompensationSchemeDescription:
In the UK, the first £85,000 of savings per person is protected by the Financial Services Compensation Scheme. Some banking brands share the same banking licence which means your deposit protection is across all brands sharing the licence. If you have also borrowed from the failed bank/building society, the compensation will not be reduced to repay your debt, separate arrangements will be made for this. The deposits of most businesses are covered up to the £85,000 limit, but businesses should check with their bank before they apply as there are exclusions.

This bank/building society shares its compensation limit with
AA, Post Office Money®.

Account.AccessNote: Earlier access on 90 day loss of interest.
Account.TaxMethod: Interest is paid tax free
Account.IntPaidAwayCompoundedType: Interest must be compounded

OpenTo.OpenToNote: in postcode areas: LE, CV9-13 and DE11-15.

Account.IntPaidAwayCompoundedType: Interest can be paid away or compounded

ISA.TransferRestrictionNote: received within 30 days of account opening.

OpenTo.OpenToNote: Postcode areas: BB, BD, BL, CA, CH, CW, FY, LA, M, OL, PR, SK, WA, WN.

DepositorProtection.CompensationSchemeDescription:
In the UK, the first £85,000 of savings per person is protected by the Financial Services Compensation Scheme. Some banking brands share the same banking licence which means your deposit protection is across all brands sharing the licence. If you have also borrowed from the failed bank/building society, the compensation will not be reduced to repay your debt, separate arrangements will be made for this. The deposits of most businesses are covered up to the £85,000 limit, but businesses should check with their bank before they apply as there are exclusions.

This bank/building society shares its compensation limit with no other bank or building society.

Account.IntPaidAwayCompoundedType: Interest can be paid away or compounded

Account.Account: Raisin UK - 5 Year Fixed Term Deposit
Account.IncentiveNote: £30 welcome bonus can be claimed on savings accounts with a term of at least six months opened with a minimum of £10,000 (bonus added to the investment).
Account.PoolInvestorsNote: Yes via trust structure via the Raisin platform
Account.OtherNote: Sharia'a compliant. Expected profit rate. This bank operates under Islamic finance principles, the rates displayed represent the expected profit rate.
Account.TaxMethod: Interest is paid without tax being deducted, but may be taxable depending on your personal circumstances
Account.IntPaidAwayCompoundedType: Interest paid on maturity
